subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Sam Querrey survived a match point and rallied to beat John Isner, 3-6, 7-6 (4), 6-4, to win an all-American final at the Serbia Open on Sunday in Belgrade.
snippet: Sam Querrey survived a match point and rallied to beat John Isner, 3-6, 7-6 (4), 6-4, to win an all-American final at the Serbia Open on Sunday in Belgrade.
